titleStmt.title: Two petitions of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common-Councell assembled: to the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled: which petition was presented to both houses, July 18. 1648. With the answer of the Lords.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the Honourable city of London,

notesStmt.note: The Lords' reply is dated 18 July 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
